title: China's exports grow by 8.7% in August, beating expectations
content: China's exports have been a bright spot in an economy otherwise struggling to boost domestic demand.
summary: China's exports have been a bright spot in an economy otherwise struggling to boost domestic demand.

title: Asia-Pacific markets higher as China exports beat expectations
content: China's exports grew 8.7% year-on-year in August and imports grew 0.5%, compared to the forecast of 6.5% and 2% in a Reuters poll.
summary: China's exports grew 8.7% year-on-year in August and imports grew 0.5%, compared to the forecast of 6.5% and 2% in a Reuters poll.

title: Cautious Chinese travelers are taking more last-minute trips as economy struggles
content: Chinese travelers are taking more last-minute trips as they become more cautious with spending amid lackluster economic recovery.
summary: Chinese travelers are taking more last-minute trips as they become more cautious with spending amid lackluster economic recovery.

title: Jumbo 50 basis points Fed rate cut should not raise alarm, analyst says
